originalTitle: And now for something completely different
note:
In this Public Domain disk number 14 sometimes completely different. Robert Heerekop - an active radio amateur - has written a program in his spare time with which one can "telex" according to the RTTY protocol.
This program can be used to intercept telex messages from press agencies and decode them. With the help of a small concatenation of electronic components, cost of ten guilders maximum - it is possible to realize the whole.
Your librarian has been kind enough to type in the complete manual including the connections of the RTTY converter. It's actually a wonderful program. For prying eyes is it possible
to instantly receive the latest news in the living room.
Needed: RTTY converter receiver (and transmitter) and a little patience.
